select ,n.sysname,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_menu c WHERE c.parentId = m.id and deleted = 0) AS subCount from sys_menu m left join sys_identifier n on n.sysid = m.sysid
and exists (select 1 from sys_identifier iden where iden.sysid = m.sysid )
select id,name,url,parentId,actions,levelno,isleaf from sys_menu where deleted= 0 and parentId is null and levelno = 1 and sysid = #{sysid}
select id,name,url,parentId,actions,levelno,isleaf from sys_menu where deleted= 0 and parentId is not null and levelno = 2 and sysid = #{sysid}
select id,name,url,parentId,actions,levelno,isleaf from sys_menu where deleted= 0 and parentId is not null and levelno = 3 and sysid = #{sysid}
select id,name,url,parentId,actions from sys_menu where deleted= 0 and parentId is null and sysid = #{sysid}

select id,name,url,parentId,actions from sys_menu m where deleted= 0 and parentId is null and sysid = #{sysid} and exists (select * from sys_role_rel r where r.objId = m.id and relType = 0 and r.roleId = #{roleId})
select id,name,url,parentId,actions from sys_menu where deleted= 0 and parentId is not null and sysid = #{sysid}
